Title: Fireworks
Genre: Animation, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Romance, Sci-Fi
Writer: Shunji Iwai, Hitoshi Ône (screenplay), Christian La Monte (english script adaptation)
Actors: Suzu Hirose, Masaki Suda, Mamoru Miyano, Shintarô Asanuma
Plot: Schoolchildren Norimichi, Yûsuke and Jun'ichi want to know if fireworks look round or flat from the side. They make a plan to find the answer at a fireworks display, while Nazuna schemes to...
